alert.note: Alert for Canovanas; Carolina; Gurabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 05 at 11:32PM AST until February 06 at 12:15AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Trujillo Alto Municipality in Puerto Rico... Gurabo Municipality in Puerto Rico... Carolina Municipality in Puerto Rico... Canovanas Municipality in Puerto Rico... * Until 130 AM AST. * At 1129 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Up to one inch of rain has already fallen. Emergency managers reported some areas are already flooded and additional rains will worsen the situation. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Gurabo, Trujillo Alto, Carolina, Canovanas, Campo Rico and Celada.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
